text: Generate an HTML page with a CSS animation of a sunset.
Design an SVG logo for a fictional space exploration company.
Create a 3D model of a stylized tree using Three.js.
Write a p5.js sketch that creates an interactive particle system.
Generate the HTML and CSS for a visually appealing landing page for a new app.
Develop an SVG infographic explaining the water cycle.
Brainstorm ideas for a generative art piece based on natural patterns, and provide a starting code snippet in JavaScript.
Compose a visual poem using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to animate the text.
